response.original_title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return Of The King (Extended Edition)
response.overview: The Final chapter in a trilogy of films beloved by many, from the original books by renowned author, J.R.R.Tolkien, and directed by the infamous Peter Jackson. Fans of the films worldwide consider the extended editions of the Peter Jackson films to be the definitive versions. The Final battle, light versus darkness, good versus evil. Will Sauron win his takeover of Middle Earth that has spanned centuries? What will happen to Gollum? What of Frodo and Sam? What of The Fellowship? And what of The Kingdom? Time will tell in this epic conclusion, in all it's glory, the extended edition of this film boasts a total of 4hrs 11mins.
response.tagline: The epic Extended conclusion to The Lord Of The Rings films by Peter Jackson
response.title: The Lord Of The Rings: The Return Of The King (Extended Edition)
